title: Grass Valley Edius 9.10.3086 Pro [TeamOS]
description:
EDIUS supports real-time work with video in almost all known formats, as well as with uncompressed video. The program allows you to work with an unlimited number of layers containing audio, video data or effects. Projects created in EDIUS can be saved using the native Canopus HQ codec, which has the option of encoding with variable bitrates. Edius is one of the best professional programs for non-linear video editing. Supports editing video formats AVCHD, HDV, DV, MPEG-1, MPEG-2 in real time. 

Features of Grass Valley EDIUS: 

Installation of all kinds of HD / SD formats, including DV, HDV, AVCHD, MPEG-2, Windows Media and QuickTime, in real time.
Flexible user interface, unlimited number of tracks for video, sound, captions and graphics 
Editing and converting in real time of all kinds of HD / SD formats (16: 9 and 4: 3) 
Editing and converting in real time video with different frame rates of 60i, 50i and 24p 
Editing and converting in real time video with different resolutions 1440x1080, 1280x720 and 720x480 
HD / SD effects, keros, transitions and titles in real time 
DV video output in real time directly from the time line 
The possibility of editing immediately several cognitions on one time line 
High-speed export HDV 
Coding of individual segments of a time line ('Smart Rendering'). With the support of MPEG and HDV, Segment Encoding greatly reduces the time it takes to export a project by encoding only edited and modified clip segments 
DVD authoring on time line 
Software utility Quick Titler for titration, working in real time 
Support for new file formats based, even Infiniti JPEG 2000, XDCAM and XDCAM EX, P2 (DVCPRO and AVC-Intra), and GFCAM 
Multi-cameras, editing up to eight different sources at one and the same time 
High speed SD HDV and MPEG-2 export, built on dual-core technology 
Direct-to-DVD export
